name: Product Design Meet-up #1
description: The first product design meet-up will be held on 16th March, 2016 at the National Design Centre auditorium as part of Design Singapore Week 2016. The digital product design scene in Singapore is growing. There are more and more talented in-house designers, who lead and innovate through UI and UX design. For the first meet-up, speakers from product companies will share their design stories, how they solve problems, and their approach to design thinking. Speakers (TBC)... If you're interested, please RSVP. The National Design Centre auditorium can only accommodate 122 seats. First come, first served.
location: National Design Centre Auditorium 111 Middle Rd, 188969, Singapore
